doc:
Nathaniel Shaw (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nathaniel_Shaw_(director) 0 Nathaniel Shaw is an American theatre director, choreographer, and actor. He began his career as a dancer with the Paul Taylor Dance Company and later became the founding and artistic director of The Active Theater in New York. He was Associate Choreographer for the Broadway production and first national tour of Once (musical) In 2015 he became the Development Director for the Tony and Olivier Award-winning producers, Glass Half Full Productions. In July 2016, he became Artistic Director of Virginia Repertory Theatre in Richmond. Nathaniel_Shaw is an_American_theatre_director , choreographer , and actor . He began his_career as a_dancer with the_Paul_Taylor_Dance_Company and later_became the_founding and artistic_director of The_Active_Theater in New_York . He was Associate_Choreographer for the_Broadway_production_and_first_national_tour of Once_(_musical_) In 2015 he became the_Development_Director for the_Tony_and_Olivier_Award-winning_producers , Glass_Half_Full_Productions . In July_2016 , he became Artistic_Director of Virginia_Repertory_Theatre in Richmond .
